```{r setup, include = F}
library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)

gs4_deauth()

temp_sheet <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1W9NhgxlZsbb-JW6W5nu8a_7OmF42WV6T3hyfb4PMvLY/edit?usp=sharing")
```

```{r}
#| echo: False

temp_sheet %>%
  select(-Admin_Notes, -Day) %>%
  mutate(Date = as.Date(Date)) %>%
  gt() %>%
  fmt_date(Date, date_style = 31) %>%
  sub_missing(columns = c(Week, `Textbook Sections`, Topic, `Lecture Materials`, `Section Materials`), missing_text = "") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(Date, Topic, `Textbook Sections`, `Lecture Materials`, `Section Materials`)
    )
  ) %>%
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(Week)
  ) %>%
  cols_align(
    align = "right", 
    columns = c(Date)
  ) %>%
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(`Lecture Materials`)
  ) %>%
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(`Section Materials`)
  ) %>%
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(Week, `Textbook Sections`, Topic, `Lecture Materials`, `Section Materials`)
  ) %>%
  cols_width(
    Week ~ pct(7),
    Date ~ pct(13), 
    `Textbook Sections` ~ pct(25),
    Topic ~ pct(30),
    `Lecture Materials` ~ pct(13),
    `Section Materials` ~ pct(12)
  ) %>%
  cols_label_with(fn = function(x) {
      janitor::make_clean_names(x, case = "title") %>%
        toupper() %>%
        stringr::str_replace_all("^|$", "**") %>%
        md()
    }) %>%
  tab_options(table.font.size = 16) %>%
  opt_row_striping()
```
